message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10500? I'm willing to be flexible to make this deal work, but $10500 is the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10000. This is my final offer.
